answers.answer: Hi,if your blood sugar levels are consistently high then it could be related.What are your actual blood sugar levels (fasting, and 2 hours after eating)?What is your latest A1C result?LEt us know.

Many thanks for your helpful reply but my glucose levels are steady at round about 6my blood pressure is at the moment 113/73 I should be as fit as a butchers cat!!that is the only symptom of diabetes that I have, cold legs I suppose I should think my selflucky and stop moaning about it, thats what my wife says!!!

question: I have type 2 diabetes and my legs go cold is this a connection to diabetes I am not on  any medication just diet and exercise
title: mr.
